EXTRACTED VALUE: Race Driver GRID is an immersing, addictive, exhilarating, beautiful and fun racing experience you can’t afford to miss, the best so far.
Gorgeous, irresistible and a must buy, Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved 2 epitomizes fun.
The gorgeous and sometimes ludicrous backdrops offer a perfect complement to flowing fisticuffs.
As I said before, THPS had a good run, but its time to grow up. SKATE is the game that will force us to do just that.
GRAW 2 is stunning to look at, great to listen to and most of all fun to play – especially if you like cooperative multiplayer.
The City is enormous and beautiful, the cars are amazingly detailed, and the control is divine.
Joy has rarely come so reasonably priced and, whatever the price, videogames, rarely come so joyful. Indispensable, then.
